title: MYRTLE GULLY
paragraphs: In 1931 the Myrtle Gully track was under construction. One waterfall on Myrtle Gully, coming through a “V-shaped gorge”, was tentatively dubbed Roaring Falls. More recently it has become known as Hidden Falls. A second fall was discovered shortly afterwards in the same gully: Myrtle Gully Falls: turikina truwala
